welcome_message_body: Welcome to Villa Krause, Argentina! This charming city is known for its vibrant culture, stunning landscapes, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Villa Krause has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Puesto 32
restaurants.description: Puesto 32 is a argentinian restaurant located in Ciudad de San Juan.
restaurants.address: Mendoza Sur 2035, J5400 Ciudad de San Juan, San Juan

restaurants.name: FABRICA DE EMBUTIDOS EL ITALIANO
restaurants.description: FABRICA DE EMBUTIDOS EL ITALIANO is a deli located in Villa Krause.
restaurants.address: Mendoza Sur 4501, 5425 Villa Krause, San Juan

restaurants.name: La Madeleine
restaurants.description: La Madeleine is a breakfast spot located in Ciudad de San Juan.
restaurants.address: Calle Mitre Oeste 202, Ciudad de San Juan, San Juan

restaurants.name: Renatto
restaurants.description: Renatto is a restaurant located in Ciudad de San Juan.
restaurants.address: Av. Libertador General San Martín Oeste 1365, Ciudad de San Juan, San Juan

restaurants.name: Soychu
restaurants.description: Soychu is a vegan and vegetarian restaurant located in Ciudad de San Juan.
restaurants.address: Av José Ignacio de la Roza 223 oeste (Esq Sarmiento), 5400 Ciudad de San Juan, San Juan

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at San Juan Airport, handling both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at San Juan Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
